{ "html": { "value": "

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Whatâ€™s the Vegas Experience?

The Vegas Experience  is our closing party on Thursday night, May 9, 2019. Choose from one of four evening options when you build your personal agenda.

 

How do I attend my Vegas Experience selection?

To attend your Vegas Experience adventure, you must have your conference badge, a government-issued photo ID, and the credentials or ticket provided. We will not admit anyone without these credentials.

 

Is there an age limit?

The age limit to attend the Vegas Experience parties is 21 years and older. You must have a government-issued photo ID to attend the Vegas Experience.

 

Will there be transportation?

Transportation shuttles will be provided for conference attendees and their registered guests to their Vegas Experience selection. More information will be available at the event, including details in the mobile app.

 

Can I get into the parties without my credentials or ticket?

No. Lost credentials may result in your not attending the party.

Frequently Asked Questions

 

What’s the Vegas Experience?

The Vegas Experience  is our closing party on Thursday night, May 9, 2019. Choose from one of four evening options when you build your personal agenda.

 

How do I attend my Vegas Experience selection?

To attend your Vegas Experience adventure, you must have your conference badge, a government-issued photo ID, and the credentials or ticket provided. We will not admit anyone without these credentials.

 

Is there an age limit?

The age limit to attend the Vegas Experience parties is 21 years and older. You must have a government-issued photo ID to attend the Vegas Experience.

 

Will there be transportation?

Transportation shuttles will be provided for conference attendees and their registered guests to their Vegas Experience selection. More information will be available at the event, including details in the mobile app.
